headline: Best Quant-rated small- and mid-cap healthcare stocks as LLY hits $1T in market cap
synthesis: This ties into broader market movement and sentiment.

timeline.text: The surge of LLY to a $1 trillion market cap highlights the increasing investor confidence in the healthcare sector, particularly among smaller and mid-sized companies. As these stocks are evaluated based on quantitative metrics, their performance may reflect underlying trends that appeal to risk-averse investors. This shift could signal a robust interest in diversifying portfolios within the healthcare domain.
